newsitem.title: ITALY: Bank of Italy sets 3.0 billion mark repo tender.
newsitem.headline: Bank of Italy sets 3.0 billion mark repo tender.

text.p: The Bank of Italy set a 3.0 billion mark repurchase tender for April 18 for resale on May 20.
The auction will be held tomorrow and the results will be announced soon afterwards.
The Bank said the lira/mark rate on which the tender will be based will be announced tomorrow morning.
